comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This photograph is scanned or printed backwards. The exhaust stack on this aircraft should be in the right/starboard side as well as the angles on the propeller blades should be reversed.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77345821@N06] Is this now the correct orientation?
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
